LoomHosts.com – Dallas, TX – 50% OFF and Upgrades!
Hello there! We are LoomHosts – a provider dedicated at offering reliable, affordable and solid services. We have recently passed our one-year mark at providing services to clients. In line with our soft launch, we are launching a promotion for our OpenVZ VPS Service in Dallas, Texas. Services are provided from Limestone Networks (AS46475) which is multihomed to providers such as Telia, Savvis and Cogent.
Features:
-20 IPv6 Addresses
-Test IP: 74.63.196.210 | Download Test: http://loomhosts.com/100mb.test 

We will be offering 50% OFF for our current plans listed on our website, found here: https://my.loomhosts.com/cart.php
Get a “Baby VPS” with:
30GB Diskspace
300GB Bandwidth
128MB Dedicated RAM
1 IP Address
1 Core
For just $1.99! 
Order it here: https://my.loomhosts.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=1&promocode=Loom2012

“Low End VPS”
45GB Diskspace
400GB Bandwidth
192MB Dedicated RAM
1 IP Address
1 Core
For $2.49!
Order it here: https://my.loomhosts.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=2&promocode=Loom2012

“Medium VPS”
60GB Diskspace
500GB Bandwidth
256MB Dedicated RAM
1 IP Address
1 Core
For $4.49!
Order it here: https://my.loomhosts.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=9&promocode=Loom2012 

“Starter VPS”
75GB Diskspace
1000GB Bandwidth
512MB Dedicated RAM
1 IP Address
2 Cores
For $6.99!
Order it here: https://my.loomhosts.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=3&promocode=Loom2012 

Need a custom plan? Simply come onto our site at http://LoomHosts.com/ and open a Support Ticket (https://my.loomhosts.com/submitticket.php), or come onto Live Chat!

You can also use the code “Loom2012” on all our other VPS offerings to get 50% off as well.
